channel.title: Dragon arrows help
channel.description:
Ok so im trying to get my dark bow in my server to shoot dragon arrows. So i fixed the arrows to stack so i got that part done. But when i wield the arrows they go into the arrow slot and wield darkbow when i attack monster it saids you have no arrows?
Can someone help me please.
-Foolio

item.title: Dragon arrows help
item.dc:creator: @runescapeddsk0 runescapeddsk0
item.description:
@runescapeddsk0 wrote:

change all 892(rune arrow) to the dragon arrow code…

item.title: Dragon arrows help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Ok in client java serch for

outStream.writeByte(playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] -1); //amount }

Under that u should see some thing like this

if (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == ###){ HasArrows = true; }

Under that add this

if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == ####){ HasArrows = true; }

In # add code of arrows u wan’t

2 ND part
Search for this

public void CheckArrows() {

U shuld see somting like

[code] for(int k = 880; k < 893; k++){

if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == k){
HasArrows = true;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == ###){
HasArrows = true;
}[/code]

Under that add

if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == ####){ HasArrows = true; }

id for arrows

That should work if it dosn’t il check out how to fix

Read full topic
